column4: i've tried everything to completely remove AWN so i can start over fresh, and no matter what i do every time i re-install it it loads my old settings that are all screwed up.... can someone please help me before i freak out

http://www.planetblur.org/hosted/awnforum/index.php?shard=forum&action=g_reply&ID=2305&page=1&isLive=true i used all the rm commands from that thread, searched thru my foleders myself and deleted stuff, completely removed from apt and synaptic
check for a hidden configuation file in your /home directory
ive looked i cant find anything related
